definition: to submit an expense account/to apply for reimbursement/to write off/to wipe out
to announce/to inform/report/newspaper/recompense/revenge/CL:份[fen4],張|张[zhang1]
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin
expense claim form

sentences.english: How do I submit an expense report?
You need all your receipts for reimbursement.
sentences.chinese: 你需要上交所有要报销的单据。

sentences.english: The only expense covered 100% is embalming.
sentences.chinese: 唯一能够全部报销的费用是尸体防腐。

sentences.english: Are all disbursements, except from petty cash, made by check?
sentences.chinese: 是否所有的报销，除了备用金外均使用支票支付？

sentences.english: Thank goodness my company will let me reimburse all this.
sentences.chinese: 上帝，多亏公司可以让我报销这些费用。

sentences.english: All expenses or applications of expenses have to be approved by the budget holders.
sentences.chinese: 所有借支或费用报销均需由预算控制人审批。

sentences.english: The old printing press will have to be pensioned off.
sentences.chinese: 那个旧印刷机得报销了。

sentences.english: B: Not yet. I'll report the taxi and meal expenses later today.
sentences.chinese: 还没有，我今天晚些时候连打车和吃饭一起报销。

sentences.english: The formal invoices must be submitted for reimbursing those items requested to present invoices.
sentences.chinese: 规定凭发票报销的项目，必须提交正式发票。

sentences.english: He will likely not bring APCs allowing to you scare your enemy off.
sentences.chinese: 他可能没有带着APC，那么你就可以报销敌人了。

sentences.english: Not yet. I'll report the taximeal expenses later today.
sentences.chinese: 还没有，我今天晚些时候连打车和吃饭一起报销。

sentences.english: The company will remunerate you for your travelling expenses.
And will Maria pay for the trip?
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚会给你报销旅费吗？

sentences.english: You will receive a reimbursement for visa expenses incurred for the purposes of project-related travel.
sentences.chinese: 未经事先批准的出差费用将不予报销。

sentences.english: I have an untaxed expense account.
sentences.chinese: 我有一张免税的报销单。

sentences.english: The company will repay you for your travelling expenses.
sentences.chinese: 公司会给你报销旅差费。

definition: medical treatment at public expense
medical insurance
to be reimbursed for actual expenses
medical insurance/abbr. for 醫療保險|医疗保险[yi1 liao2 bao3 xian3]
to report expenses/to submit accounts
complementary medicine
medical expenses
New Rural Cooperative Medical Scheme/abbr. for 新型農村合作醫療|新型农村合作医疗
to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
to pay sb else's expense with the expectation of being reimbursed by that person later
render an account/submit an expense account/apply for reimbursement
New Rural Cooperative Medical Scheme/abbr. to 新農合|新农合
pinyin: Xin1 xing2 Nong2 cun1 He2 zuo4 Yi1 liao2

definition: to receive hospital treatment/to be hospitalized
business travel expenses
to advance funds
industrial injury
